TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutoResizedEventHandler(object sender, AutoResizedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutoResizedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutoResizedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutoResizedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutoResizedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutoResizedEventArgs ^ e);
type AutoResizedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AutoResizedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示将处理 所引发的 事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 布局系统导致 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> 自动调整大小时，将引发 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized> 事件。 典型的处理程序实现会将大小更改传递到 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>中包含的 HWND。
